channel.title: Where to code a dropping method [317]
channel.description: I'm not sure, but I don't think my client has a dropping method period. Like whenever I drop something, it never shows up on the ground. It just dissapears completely. I need help knowing where to code in a new dropping method.

I’m not sure, but I don’t think my client has a dropping method period. Like whenever I drop something, it never shows up on the ground. It just dissapears completely. I need help knowing where to code in a new dropping method.
